item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Okay, my internet was just off today, just got a new modem thing, and while it was off i figured i would code my own type of castle wars without any tutorial.

Well i got everything set up besides the part were they are in the waiting area, i canâ€™t get the coords figured out.

For example, when your trying to make a funpk area or something and you have to have the coords, if you dont know what i mean, heres the zammy team coords of my waiting area.

public boolean isIncwzammy() { if((absX >= 2428 && absX <= 2410 && absY >= 9532 && absY <=9510)) return true; else return false; }

If you could maybe tell me what im doing wrong? :o

would be loads of help, thanks!

~greg
